knimeNode.name: List To Set
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node replaces any selected List Collection cells with Set Collection cells

intro.p: This nodes converts any List collection cells in selected columns to Set collection cells. List collections have a defined order, and may contain duplicates. Sets do not necessarily have a defined order, but may not contain duplicates.
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select the incoming List column(s) to convert to sets
If this option is checked, then the cells will be sorted in ascending order of their comparator, otherwise they will be in order of first occurrence in the list
Should the node execution fail if there are no matching collection columns?

ports.outPort: The input table with collections converted from Lists to Sets
